phrs.translation: 空中飞人, 秋千, 飞人, 地面飞人
荡秋千演员, 空中飞人, 吊秋千表演者
卓纪思网络, 卓纪思, 卓思网络, 卓纪思网络公司
秋千架, 秋千床, 卡迪拉克组合架

sentences.sentence: Install a trapeze swing onto their swing set.
sentences.translation: 在他们的秋千组合上，安装吊架。

sentences.sentence: Swiftly, neatly, with the grace of the young man on the flying trapeze, he was gone from his body.
sentences.translation: 带着飞荡的高架秋千上那个年轻人的优雅姿态，他灵巧而敏捷地从躯体里走出来。

sentences.sentence: A beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of the circus performers who is also a dwarf.
sentences.translation: 一位漂亮的荡秋千演员同意与马戏团演员的领导结婚，他也是一位侏儒。
